metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45038 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3, and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. By using an action=rollback query, attackers can view private wiki contents.

notes.Note: sbeattie> include upstream dda5355c0ee804c94ff371a8a16c4a2a8e4436bd as a prerequisite to the fix for this CVE to make it apply more cleanly. introduced in 0a8403271109 (v1.33.0)

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
